Name: AlterVerse: Disruption
About the game: This is a multi-player, FPS, Deathmatch, team-based CTF, and Treasure looting Game. Currently in alpha, we are proud to release our first game, Disruption . 5 Home Worlds and 10 Quest Levels in a variety of themes are also in development. When complete, the AlterVerse will be a gaming and world-building multiverse, where users can play and create an infinite number of interconnected, Player Owned Worlds. Players will soon be able to create multi-player games with no coding or art skills required. Join us today and change your stars.
